main event: Several residents of Charlotte County, Florida sighted several bright white lights alternately blinking red and green on the nights of the 17th, 18th, and 19th of October 1966.
interesting points: The objects had no discernible shape and appeared as distant lights.
The objects were the same size as a large star and were white with pulsating red and green lights.
Seven objects were sighted in various parts of the sky, including two in the west, two in the east, and three in the north.
The observers used binoculars, a rifle scope, and a telescope to observe the objects.
The objects were visible for three hours and thirty minutes and did not disappear.
sighted object: seven bright white lights with pulsating red and green lights
witnesses: Several civilian residents of Charlotte County, Florida
